        Method to add an appointment
        Parameters:
        activityUser - the logged in user
        appointmentId - the auto-generated appointment ID
        patientId - the assigned patient ID
        nutritionId - the nutritionist ID attending the patient
        startDate - the start Date of the appointment
        startTime - the start time of the appointment
        endDate - the end date of the appointment
        endTime - the end time of the appointment
        appointmentType - the appointment type
        thePurpose - the purpose of the appointment
        Returns:
        true if the appointment is added
